item.description:
Afro Cuban Movement Bootcamp with World Famous Gordon Neil!
Saturday, August 9, 1-4pm AND
Saturday, August 16, 1-4pm

SPECIAL Afro Cuban Movement BOOTCAMPS
with WORLD FAMOUS Gordon Neil!

TWO Special 3 Hour Bootcamps
Take One or Both!

Back by Popular Demand!
Joining us in Boston for 1 Month!

Don't Miss Out on these ONE OF A KIND workshops!
Taught by a TRUE Professional!

No partner necessary...
Pay in Advance and Save $35!
Limited Space Available!

Each workshop includes:
-- Proper Body Warm-up & Stretch
-- Afro Caribbean Body Isolation/Movement Breakdown
-- Creative Footwork Application


EACH BOOTCAMP IS DIFFERENT!
1 Day Bootcamp: $40 Advance; $50 @ Door
Special Savings! Both Days: $65 Advance Price!

Dance Companies & Groups of 5+, Email us for Discounts..

Register Online Today!
http://www.masacoteen...

Location: Green Street Studios; 185 Green St.; Cambridge, MA


Gordon will also be available for privates during his visit.
Contact us ASAP to schedule a lesson.

----------------------------------------------------------
Afterparty @ Masacote's Beantown Salsa Jam!
http://www.masacoteen...
----------------------------------------------------------

Brought to you by Masacote Entertainment, Metamovements, & the Boston/Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group!
item.how_to_find_us: Anara will be in charge. She will be at registration :)

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group
